law.catch_line: Nominations for public offices that are filled by elections governed by this article shall be made:...
law.text:
Nominations for public offices that are filled by elections governed by this article shall be made:
by party primary, for candidates of a principal political party;
by petition, for candidates not affiliated with any political party; or
in accordance with the constitution and by-laws of the political party, for candidates of a political party that does not nominate by party primary.
